sections.heading: Case falling within application of two or more articles; plaintiff may bring proceeding under any applicable articleIf a case falls within the provisions of two or more of Articles 2671 through 2674, the plaintiff may bring the executory proceeding under any applicable article
sections.text: Case falling within application of two or more articles; plaintiff may bring proceeding under any applicable articleIf a case falls within the provisions of two or more of Articles 2671 through 2674, the plaintiff may bring the executory proceeding under any applicable article.
